submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n= len(nums)
        m=n//2
        tuples = [list(sorted([nums[i],nums[n-i-1]])) for i in range(m)]
        count = collections.Counter([b-a for a,b in tuples])
        points = [max(b,k-a) for a,b in tuples] # 大于 point 的点,需要修改两个数字
        # 搞一个类似前缀和的东西
        points.sort()
        count2 = collections.Counter(points)
        preSum = [0]*(k+1)
        for i in range(1,k+1):
            preSum[i]=preSum[i-1]+count2[i-1]
        res = float("inf")
        for i in range(k+1):
            res = min(res,m-count[i]+preSum[i])
        return res
